value.fullName: Unlimited self-service webcasts for up to 500 participants that includes streaming webcam video & broadcast audio support. 2 speaker lines included per event and unlimited on-demand viewing for 12 months. Cost incurred per additional participant.
value.label: Unlimited self-service webcasts for up to 500 participants that includes streaming webcam video & broadcast audio support. 2 speaker lines included per event and unlimited on-demand viewing for 12 months. Cost incurred per additional participant.
